Package Sugarscape

Class Summary
Cell This is a component of the Sugarscape object.
CellSpace Implements the CellSpace object that defines the Sugarscape grid.
Citizen The Citizen object is modeled on a human being.
GoLconst This file provides the most direct option to configure and manipulate the behavior and properties of objects in the Sugarscape simulation.
It allows a researcher to create an initial scenario and to tweak rules within that scenario.
